example_sentence_italian: Questo mese è pieno di impegni.
example_sentence_english: This month is full of commitments.

example_sentence_italian: Ci vuole un mese per finire.
example_sentence_english: It takes a month to finish.

example_sentence_italian: Il mese prossimo vado in vacanza.
example_sentence_english: Next month I go on vacation.

example_sentence_italian: Ho trascorso dei mesi in Italia.
example_sentence_english: I spent some months in Italy.

example_sentence_italian: La fine del mese è vicina.
example_sentence_english: The end of the month is near.
I refer to the past months.
From next month I will change jobs.

example_sentence_italian: Dai mesi passati ho imparato molto.
example_sentence_english: From the past months I have learned a lot.

example_sentence_italian: Nel mese di luglio fa molto caldo.
example_sentence_english: In the month of July it is very hot.
In the winter months it often snows.

example_sentence_italian: Il comunicato sul mese scorso è uscito.
example_sentence_english: The announcement about last month has come out.
I have data on the summer months.

example_sentence_italian: Col mese di luglio iniziano le ferie.
example_sentence_english: With the month of July the holidays begin.

example_sentence_italian: Coi mesi ho migliorato la tecnica.
example_sentence_english: Over the months I improved my technique.
